title: Je T'Aime, Je T'Aime
creator_credit: Parc Film, Les Productions Fox Europa, Alain Resnais, Mag Bodard and Jacques Sternberg
brief_description: Recovering from an attempted suicide, a man is selected to participate in a time travel experiment that has only been tested on mice. A malfunction in the experiment causes the man to experience moments from his past in a random order.

constellations_other.name: Obviously the time continuum has been disrupted...again and again and again!
constellations_other.description: Eadweard Muybridge was able to capture time and play it back again creating endless time paradoxes where subjects are destined to repeat their previous actions. Filmmakers have since explored such notions via time travel narratives questioning destiny, fate and choice.

creator_credit_for_label: Parc Film, Les Productions Fox Europa, Alain Resnais, Mag Bodard and Jacques Sternberg
